conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours optimize their HR data and make more informed decisions. I saw that Lattice is a G2 2026 Best Software Awards winner, and I was wondering if you're currently using any data processing solutions to support your HR platform?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (skeptical) Ah, another sales call. What makes you think we need a data processing solution? We're already using Lattice to manage our people, pay, and performance, and it seems to be working just fine.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your skepticism, but that's exactly why I'm calling. While Lattice is a great HR platform, it's primarily focused on managing HR functions, not optimizing data processing. Our solution, DeepData AI, can help you unlock more insights from your HR data, such as employee engagement, performance, and compensation. We've seen companies like yours reduce manual data processing time by up to 70% and make more data-driven decisions.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (still skeptical) I'm not sure I buy that. We've invested a lot in Lattice, and I'm not convinced that we need another solution to manage our data. What makes DeepData AI so special?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a fair question. What sets us apart is our ability to integrate with existing HR systems like Lattice, and provide advanced analytics and machine learning capabilities to help you uncover hidden insights in your data. For example, we can help you identify trends in employee turnover, or predict which employees are at risk of leaving. We've also worked with several companies in the HR space, and we've seen significant ROI from our solution.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (somewhat interested) Okay, I'll give you that. But how do I know that DeepData AI will integrate seamlessly with our existing Lattice platform? We can't afford to disrupt our current workflows.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a great question. We've actually worked with several Lattice customers in the past, and we have a pre-built integration that makes it easy to connect our solutions. We can also provide a customized implementation plan to ensure a smooth transition. Would you be open to a demo to see how our solution can work with your existing Lattice platform?
